name: Ashley Heafy
title: Independent Graphic Designer
description: We interview Ashley Heafy about the move from fine art to graphic design, travel, Scandinadian Design, and why feminism is more relevant today than ever.
quote: If you involve yourself in the community and find your place, then you’ll be successful.

name: Clark Orr
title: Independent Illustrator & Designer
description: We interview Clark Orr about the slurry of talent and creativity happening in Orlando, Florida.
quote: There’s something in the water [in Orlando] … It’s really on par with stuff that’s going on in New York and LA … A lot of people are doing stuff out here even better than some of those places.

name: Justin Mezzell
quote: Don’t wait for an invitation. … Figure out how to get involved. We need more young people to feel like they deserve a seat at the table.
description: In our first inerview, we talk with Justin Mezzell about design, and the importance of stepping up and getting involved.
title: Art Director at Code School
